data.meta_description: قم بتنزيل APK لـ Sri Lanka 24x7 FM Radio  (1.0) للأندرويد مجانًا. تتمتع أجهزة الراديو السريلانكية تدفق أفضل السريلانكية والتاميل، السنهالية الموسيقى 24 X 7.
data.text:
تتمتع أجهزة الراديو السريلانكية تدفق أفضل السريلانكية والتاميل، السنهالية الموسيقى 24 X 7.

SriLanka 24x7 FM Radio is a collection of best online Srilankan radios streaming best of Srilankan, Tamil, Sinhala, devotional, classical, western music 24 X 7 online.

You can enjoy listening to your music on your android phone, no matter where you are and best part is that, you get to listen to your favorite music free by just having internet connection, consuming very little data. This app can work even with 2G/3G connection, for better results and buffer free use 3G/4G.

This app is loaded with features like favorites list, sleep timer to auto shutdown FM after a time, sharing with friends, background playing, app control from Notification area etc.

Features :

★ Simple User Interface with Station Logos.

★ Buffer free listening.

★ Works even with 3G connection speed.

★ Aesthetic listening experience

★ Continuously live stream.

★ Option to select favorites.

★ Option to set timer for sleep.

★ Low memory resource usage.

★ Notification icon to show the status.

★ Option to control even in notification area.

SriLankan 24x7 FM Radio Disclaimer :

Sri Lanka 24x7 FM Radio does not stream any of the stations included in this app, all the streaming links are from third parties available free on the internet to listen. All the credit goes to respective publishers. Sri Lanka 24x7 FM Radio is just a collection of all the available stations from different publishers for Sri Lankan listeners in the form app. If any one finds this app violating broadcasting any copyright protected channels, you can Email us the channel name at [email protected]. We will remove the channel from our app list subject to validity of your email request. For bugs, your FM add or removal request, please contact us at [email protected].

Since none of the channels are streamed by Sri Lanka 24x7 FM Radio, we are not responsible for its contents being streamed by the radio stations.
